backend/main.mo: Implements user profile CRUD with access control and blob storage plus legacy post and event handling.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old userProfiles to the new profile format with added fields and defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and dark mode styles for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theming, age gate, layout, and root application structure.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age-verification component enforcing 18+ access with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication UI with Internet Identity login, admin-claim action, and account dropdown.
frontend/src/components/community/PostAc: Implements edit and delete controls for posts with dialogs and state handling.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Displays an optional post image by converting byte data to a blob URL with cleanup.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Renders a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Provides responsive navigation with active link highlighting and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines the Article type and exports static article data with content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for listing, fetching, and saving user profiles via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, creating, editing, and deleting posts and events, plus checking admin status. Wraps actor API calls and invalidates relevant queries on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a plush-themed color palette for light and dark modes. Applies global typography, background, and border styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Imports global CSS and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, offerings, and guidelines using styled cards and icons. Provides static informational content about the community.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single article based on slug, with category, read time, summary, and full content. Falls back to a not-found message if the article doesn't exist.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles with category, read time, title, and summary in a grid of cards. Each card links to its detailed article page.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements the community board with post listing, creation, editing, deletion, image attachments, and admin controls. Uses Internet Identity authentication and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that opens an email client on submit and an option to copy the site’s contact email. Includes UI for user input and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays events, lists existing ones, and provides a form for authenticated users to create new events with validation.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a static grid gallery of plushie-themed images with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage hero section, feature highlights, and navigation links with a fallback for hero image loading errors.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an individual profile page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Lists community profiles with avatars and bios, handling loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Converts backend errors into simplified user-friendly messages with special handling for auth and validation issues.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Provides image file validation, conversion, and size/type checks for uploads.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Handles file-to-blob conversion, preview URLs, and retrieving direct URLs for profile images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations for the site's theme.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, design directions, feature list, and known UI issues for the Plushie Haven website.
